facebook.title: What was the federal role in starting the shale-gas revolution?
facebook.summary:
Many "free market" adherents believe that government spending on R&D is simply unnecessary and wasteful. They forget that the government's R&D spending led to many new innovations in the shale gas revolution, as well as in many other technology spheres.
Ex
